metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46735 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Symfony is a PHP framework for web and console applications and a set ofreusable PHP components. Starting in version 6.0.0 and prior to version6.3.8, the error message in `WebhookController` returns unescapeduser-submitted input. As of version 6.3.8, `WebhookController` now doesn'treturn any user-submitted input in its response.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
